tips.tip: You can't mess with people's heads, that's for sure. But that's what music's all about, messing with people's heads.
If one hears bad music, it is one's duty to drown it by one's conversation.
I know the song and I can make all those noises at home.
Music is the most expensive of all noises.
Of all noises, I think music is the least disagreeable.
Modern music is just noise with attitude.
There'll always be some arrogant little brat who wants to make music with a guitar. Rock'n'roll will never die.
Slave drivers know well enough that when the slave is singing a hymn to liberty he is consoling himself for his slavery and not thinking about breaking his chain.
The other arts persuade us, but music takes us by surprise.
Music and women I cannot but give way to, whatever my business is.

Musical ideas pursue me to the point of torture. I cannot get rid of them, they stand before me like a wall. If it is an allegro that pursues me, my pulse beats faster, I cannot sleep; if an adagio, I find my pulse beating slowly. My imagination plays upon me as if I were a keyboard.
A music listener is like a fish that swallows a bait. If you are hooked, you can no longer do anything, you must finish the process.
There are tunes, that cling to us like dirt on an old piece of furniture.
Philosophy is the highest music.

Long ago I said that all the harm that had come to the world was due to the music, and now someone has arisen and said there will be no more concerts in Central Park because everybody behaved so badly. It seems to me self-evident: All you have to do to restore order to the world is to stop the music. It will mean people will start to speak.
The music that can deepest reach, And cure all ill, is cordial speech.
Song: the licensed medium for bawling in public things too silly or sacred to be uttered in ordinary speech.

tip.author: Sir John Hawkins on Samuel Johnson

tips.tip: Of music in general he has been heard to say, 'it excites in my mind no ideas, and hinders me from contemplating my own.

Music hath two ends, first to please the sense... and secondly to move the affections or excite passion... And it must be granted that pure impulse artificially acted and continued hath great power to excite men to act but not to think... The melody is only to add to the diversion.
Rock and roll is the hamburger that ate the world.
Sagittarius Rock 'n Roll: The most brutal, ugly, desperate, vicious form of expression it has been my misfortune to hear.
I don't believe in god. I don't believe in America. I don't believe in rock and roll. All I believe in is me.
If the music be right, the poem may be insipid or inharmonious, and still saved by the notes to which it is wedded. But this is far more true of colour. If that be wrong, all is wrong.
Music before everything else ... Music again and forever!
Music ... is something we are all touched by. No matter what culture we're from, everyone loves music.
Life exists for the love of music or beautiful things.
Music is an intellectual or sensual pleasure, according to the temperament of him who hears it.
Music is the only sensual pleasure without vice.
Music produces a kind of pleasure which human nature cannot do without.
My heart, which is so full to overflowing, has often been solaced and refreshed by music when sick and weary.
Intelligence is not knowledge, knowledge is not wisdom, wisdom is not truth, truth is not beauty, beauty is not love, love is not music. Music is best.
There are two means of refuge from the misery of life, music and cats.
Music is the nearest at hand, the most orderly, the most delicate, and the most perfect, of all bodily pleasures; it is also the only one which is equally helpful to all the ages of man.
Every kind of music is good, except the boring kind.
Ваша опера мне понравилась. Пожалуй, я напишу к ней музыку.
Так и не довелось мне поплясать под чужую дудку: все что-то не устраивало - то музыка, то инструмент, то исполнитель...
Говорить о музыке - все равно что танцевать об архитектуре.
Без музыки жизнь была бы ошибкой.
Звук должен быть окутан тишиной.
Из всей земной музыки ближе всего к небесам - биение истинно любящего сердца.
Из всех искусств музыка - самое человечное и распространенное.
Музыка - единственный всемирный язык, его не надо переводить, на нем душа говорит с душою.
Музыка не имеет отечества; отечество ее - вся вселенная.
Музыка должна высекать огонь из людских сердец.
Музыка - посредница между жизнью ума и жизнью чувств.
Музыка, не упоминая ни о чем, может сказать все.

Музыка, когда она совершенна, приводит сердце в точно такое же состояние, какое испытываешь, наслаждаясь присутствием любимого существа, то есть, что она дает, несомненно, самое яркое счастье, какое только возможно на земле.
Музыка ничего не говорит разуму: это идеально структурированная бессмыслица.
Не мы слушаем музыку, а музыка слушает нас.
Музыка — это искусство печалить и радовать без причины.
Музыка облагораживает нравы, но нравы развращают музыку.
Не знаю, в самом ли деле ангелы в присутствии Бога играют лишь Баха; но я уверен, что в своем домашнем кругу они играют Моцарта.
Нужны новые уши для новой музыки.
